The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a 30-second shootout between lawmen and 
members of a loosely organized group of outlaws called the Cowboys that took 
place at about 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday, October 26, 1881 in Tombstone, Arizona 
Territory. It is generally regarded as the most famous shootout in the history of the 
... Virgil, Morgan, and Doc Holliday were wounded, but Wyatt Earp was...
